ui_parameters.c

Program’s parameter window stuff

Summary
ui_parameters.cProgram’s parameter window stuff
PublicPublic functions.
Functions
parameters_configure_setup_uiAssembly a dialog to configure the current selected program’s parameters
parameters_reset_to_defaultChange all parameters’ values from parameters to their default value
PrivatePrivate functions.
Functions
parameters_load_program
parameters_load
parameters_load_parameter
parameters_change_selected
parameters_instanciate
parameters_deinstanciate
parameters_actionsTake the appropriate action when the parameter dialog emmits a response signal.

Public functions.

Summary
Functions

Functions

parameters_configure_setup_ui

struct ui_parameters * parameters_configure_setup_ui(void)

Assembly a dialog to configure the current selected program’s parameters

Return

The structure containing relevant data.  It will be automatically freed when the dialog closes.

parameters_reset_to_default

void parameters_reset_to_default(GeoXmlParameters *parameters)

Change all parameters’ values from parameters to their default value

Private

Private functions.
